articles.author: LINDSEY BAHR
articles.title: A Melania Trump documentary from director Bruce Ratner will be released by Amazon - The Associated Press
articles.description: Incoming first lady Melania Trump will be the subject of a new documentary directed by Brett Ratner and distributed by Amazon Prime Video. The streaming arm of the tech giant got exclusive licensing rights for a streaming and theatrical release later this yea…
articles.content: LOS ANGELES (AP) Incoming first lady Melania Trump will be the subject of a new documentary directed by Brett Ratner and distributed by Amazon Prime Video. The streaming arm of the tech giant got exc… [+2816 chars]
